title: App Module Schema
description: Schema for application module YAML files

topic.description: The main topic or category of the module

short_description.description: A brief description of the module's functionality

opencode_repository.description: URL to the module's open source code repository

screenshots.description: Filename or path to screenshots of the module

usage_scenario.description: Detailed description of how and when the module is used

description.description: Detailed description of the module's functionality

interfaces.description: List of interfaces the module provides or uses

dependencies.description: List of dependencies required by the module

external_services.description: List of external services used by the module

description.description: Description of how the service is used

involved_actors.description: List of actors involved in using or managing the module

name.description: Name or title of the actor

role.description: Role or responsibility of the actor

technical_documentation.description: URL to technical documentation for the module

deployed_in_municipalities.description: List of municipalities where the module is deployed

development_status.description: Current development status of the module

last_update.description: Date of the last update in YYYY-MM-DD format
